name: Killer Kitties
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 40

You're allergic to cats.
So every cat in the park wants to be around you.
Luckily, you've got your trusty water balloon cannon to "discourage" them!
Pick up the water balloon piles that are conveniently lying around.
If you touch a kitty, your allergies go up.
If your allergies reach 100%, you sneeze yourself into the stratosphere!
Ironically, you get points only if there's a kitty attracted to you.
The more kitties you have following you, the worse it is!

(Please note I'm not trying to make fun of people with allergies. I know people who are allergic to cats and how serious that can be. So please don't be offended.)

Left Arrow: Move left

Right Arrow: Move right

Up arrow: Jump

Down arrow: Drop down

Z: Shoot balloons
